_sText:
OK so this is the next map in my new HS_ series. Im really trying to get this map type off the ground and make it noticible like surf and zm. This map is a run down garden/graveyard. There is a pool spawn (shown in screenshots) and fog along a pathway. There is a way to get out of spawn,but its secret but you should figure it out quick enough. There are buyzones for both teams once again secrets  :)

This map features:
-Lighting
-Fog along path and above certain water pools
-Lasers in trap room (in screen shots)
-Hover pushers (hint hint corners of BIG bronwn traproom box at mid)
-invisible ladders
-VERY reflective water
-Good close range action ( I hope )

Well I hope you have fun on this map and if you like my HS_ maps let me know so i can make more of these and have my own genre of maps under the map style selection area.
 
-*-THANK YOU AGAIN SHEEPRIDER-*-

THANX

-JARHEAD
